description: FHIR Value set/code system definition for HL7 v2 table 0571 ( Invoice Processing Results Status)
name: v2 Invoice Processing Results Status

text.div:
Invoice Processing Results Status

CodeDescriptionCommentVersion
ACK Acknowledgeadded v2.6
ADJ Adjudicated with Adjustmentsadded v2.6
ADJSUB Adjudicated as Submittedadded v2.6
ADJZER Adjudicated to Zeroadded v2.6
PAID Paidadded v2.6
PEND Pendingadded v2.6
PRED Pre-DeterminationIndicates that the IPR has been adjudicated but will not be paid. Equivalent to ADJUD (Adjudicate)added v2.6
REJECT Rejectadded v2.6
